API_Description: The file size of the document in bytes. **Example (Acrobat 5.0)** Get a readout of the difference in file sizes before and after saving a document: ``` // Add the following code to the "Document Will Save" section var filesizeBeforeSave = this.filesize console.println("File size before saving is " + filesizeBeforeSave); // Add the following code to the "Document Did Save" section var filesizeAfterSave = this.filesize console.println("File size after saving is " + filesizeAfterSave); var difference = filesizeAfterSave - filesizeBeforeSave; console.println("The difference is " + difference ); if ( difference < 0 ) console.println("Reduced filesize!"); else console.println("Increased filesize!"); ```
